entities.name: obliviator
entities.description: An Obliviator is mentioned as leaving the Ministry last night, but refused to give his name.

entities.name: hall of prophecy
entities.description: The disturbance centered on the Hall of Prophecy, a place whose existence has been denied by Ministry spokeswizards.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters were serving sentences in Azkaban for trespass and attempted theft, and are believed to have been attempting to steal a prophecy.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as the prison where Death Eaters were serving sentences.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is believed to be the subject of a prophecy, and is also known to have been at the Ministry on the night in question.

entities.name: he who must not be named
entities.description: He Who Must Not Be Named is mentioned as the one that Harry Potter is believed to be able to defeat according to the prophecy.

relationships.description: Death Eaters were attempting to steal a prophecy from the Hall of Prophecy.

relationships.entity_2: he who must not be named
relationships.description: According to speculation, Harry Potter is believed to be able to defeat He Who Must Not Be Named according to the prophecy.
